title: Bakers dozen of raw T206 including portraits and Hindu Southern
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Bakers dozen of raw T206 including portraits and Hindu Southern
posts.post_content:
Prices listed below; paypal preferred.  If you want to buy singles, please add $2 for 1-2 cards; 3 or more cards ship on me.

All scans here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/for-sale-raw[/url]

AVAILABLE
George Paige:H - $300
